name: 黛西·刘易斯
introduction: Overview (1)Height	5' 1" (1.55 m)Mini Bio (1)Daisy Lewis is a British actress who trained with the National Youth Theatre of Great Britain and attended Kings College London where she studied English Literature. Daisy has acted for the BBC in Doctor Who (2005), After You've Gone (2007) and Miss Austen Regrets (2007), and has appeared as the guest lead in ITV's Lewis (2006). Doctor Who (2005) was directed by Academy Award winner Julian Fellowes (Gosford Park). She has also worked extensively with leading UK theatres including twice at the Royal Court Theatre in London . Before attending university she wrote for The Sunday Telegraph and The Art Newspaper and she most recently produced the short film Maria (2010) (aka Snap Shot); her second film The Door (2011) (starring Charles Dance) shoots in May 2011.- IMDb Mini Biography By: Tavistock Wood
